Hello user_one!

Welcome to our community of globetrotters. An amazing group of people who love sharing their experience, their love for travel and their enthusiasm.

Around the world in…

…a day. Walk in Central Park in the morning, discover the secret passages of Paris for lunch and enjoy a relaxing sunrise on Machu Picchu in the afternoon. This is now possible from the comfort of your home.

Making the world more accessible…

…to everyone. The Pandemic prevents us from traveling around the world and guides from working. This also made us want to make the world more accessible to everyone: families, children, elders, disabled, people with low resources or any kind of people hungry to travel.

Be an active member of the community…

…by traveling around the world for free (what a wonderful way to be helpful!), by supporting our guides and by sharing your traveling experiences. After your first tours you can even decide, who knows, to be one of our guides yourself.

Go enjoy the beauty and diversity of the world through the eyes of local guides!
